thread.section_title: DIY Awards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DIY Awards | diyawards.com
thread.title: Lewis

author: Lewis
title: Lewis
text: After discovering my company was retiring a colleague of mine and not doing anything for her to reward her time, effort, and commitment I searched for an answer. A quick Google search pointed me in the right direction. After selecting the plaque size and shape customization through the Adobe software was super easy. I express shipped and it arrived one day ahead of schedule. Everyone in my office loved it! Especially my coworker.
